text: Albert Gustaf Aristides Edelfelt (21 July 1854 – 18 August 1905) was a Finnish painter. He painted a lot of history subjects and portraits.Edelfelt, Albert (1854 - 1905) The National Biography of Finland Edelfelt studied and exhibited in Paris. He was invited to paint portraits of many famous people abroad. This way culture of Finland became famous many years before the country became independent. Edelfelt was above all a painter, but he also worked as a graphic artist and illustrator. His famous works include the illustrations for Johan Ludvig Runeberg's partiotic collection of poems, the 'Ensign Stål' stories (1894 - 1900). ==Gallery== File:Albert Edelfelt - Louis Pasteur - 1885.jpg|Portrait of Louis Pasteur File:Albert Edelfelt - Kaukola Ridge at Sunset - Google Art Project.jpg |Kaukola Ridge at Sunset Image:Edelfelt Larin Paraske.jpg |Larin Paraske Image:Drottning Blanka, målning av Albert Edelfelt från 1877.jpg|Queen Blanka File:Björneborgarnas marsch, akvarell av Albert Edelfelt från 1900.jpg|Porilaisten marssi Image:Hertig Karl skymfande svartvit.jpg|Duke Karl Insulting the Corpse of Klaus Fleming'' File:Albert_Edelfelt_-_Boys_Playing_on_the_Shore_-_Google_Art_Project.jpg|Boys Playing on the Shore ==References== Category:1854 births Category:1905 deaths Category:Finnish artists
